text:
Khairpur (, khīr´poor) is the twelfth largest city in the province of Sindh in southeast Pakistan. Today it is the capital of Khairpur District. It was once the capital of the former princely state of Khayrpur.
Population.
According to the 1998 census, 102,188 lived there. At the 1981 census, there were only 61,447.
